alert.note: Alert for Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 02 at 10:45PM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations over 6 inches possible. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Tioga and Potter Counties. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute Thursday and the morning commute Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to snow or mixed precipitation Friday morning. Snow or mixed precipitation will then continue through early Friday.
info.instruction: There is the potential for significant winter weather that may impact travel. Review winter weather safety and preparedness information at weather.gov/winter. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
